attributes.title: Healing Problems Humanity Faces Is Our Spiritual Responsibility
attributes.description:
13 March 2020

WHEN LOVE IS TRIGGERED IN YOU, IF YOU COOPERATE WITH THAT ENERGY FLOW AND START ACTING, IT WILL BECOME TYAGA. WHEN TYAGA IS TRIGGERED IN YOU, IF YOU START COOPERATING WITH IT AND START ACTING, IT WILL BECOME LOVE.

THE KEY POINT HERE IS: WHEN THEY ARE TRIGGERED, START COOPERATING, ACTING, WORKING.

THE MOMENT YOU FEEL TYAGA, WITHOUT THE FEAR OF FAILURE - RENOUNCE! EVEN IF YOU FAIL IT IS OK. NOTHING IS WRONG IN FAILING, SOMETHING IS SERIOUSLY WRONG IN NOT TRYING. A FAILED SANYASIS IS 100 TIMES MORE SUCCESSFUL THAN A MEDIOCRE GRIHASTA - BECAUSE OF THE DEPTH FROM WHICH HE IS ATTEMPTING FOR TYAGA.

IN ANY LEVEL, LARGER ATTEMPT FOR HIGHER TYAGA IS BEST. DOING TYAGA OF MOOD SWING IS HIGHEST TYAGA. NITHYA PUJA HELPS THE RENUNCIATION OF MOOD SWINGS. EVERYDAY MORNING AT 6, YOU HAVE TO SIT FOR PUJA.
THE TREND FOR YOUR MOOD FOR THE WHOLE DAY IS ALWAYS SET IN THE MORNING WHEN YOU WAKE UP. SO, WHEN YOU SET FOR EARLY MORNING , NITHYA YOGA AND PUJA - IT IS BEST!

NITHYA PUJA AND NITHYA YOGA ARE BEST FOR RENUNCIATION OF MOOD SWINGS.

EARLY MORNING, THERE IS ALWAYS GAS IN THE STOMACH, IT MAKES YOU FORGET THE HIGHER IDEALS IN YOUR LIFE. RENOUNCING THE MOOD SWINGS IS THE MOST PRO LIFE DECISION YOU WILL TAKE. ANYONE WHO IS INTEGRATED TO SPIRITUAL ROUTINE WILL NOT KNOW SOMETHING CALLED MOOD SWINGS EXIST. MOOD SWINGS BECOME IRRELEVANT TO YOU.

CORONAVIRUS IS IRRELEVANT TO ANY PRACTISING HINDU VILLAGE. DEVI HERSELF DOES THIS FASTING;PACHAIPATINNI VIRATHAM FROM MASI MAGHAM FROM SAMAYAPURAM. THAT IS THE SOURCE TEMPLE FOR ALL MARIAMMAN TEMPLES. IN THAT TEMPLE IN SAMAYAPURAM, DEVI HERSELF STARTS THE NIRAHARA SAMYAMA, SHE IS GIVEN NAIVEDYAM OF ONLY PANAGAM (JAGGERY WATER), BUTTER MILK AND COCONUT WATER. ONLY THESE LIQUIDS ARE OFFERED, AND NO SOLID FOOD. THE WHOLE VILLAGE FOLLOWS WHAT THEY DO. THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT IS RECOMMENDED FOR MODERN DAY. JUST DO THIS FASTING, CORONA IS IRRELEVANT TO YOU - JAGGERY WATER, BUTTERMILK, ADDING NEEM LEAF AROUND YOU - IN YOUR BATH, AROUND YOU, IN YOUR HOUSE, TURMERIC - IN YOUR BATH AND FOOD.

THIS IS THE FORMAL ANNOUNCEMENT FROM KAILASA. ALL OF YOU PLEASE OBEY THE INSTRUCTIONS FROM YOUR GOVERNMENT, LAW OF THE LAND. BECAUSE IN MANY COUNTRY CORONA IS BECOMING A SERIOUS PROBLEM. PLEASE ALL OF YOU OBEY YOUR COUNTRY LAW. WHICHEVER COUNTRY BANNED LARGE GATHERING, PLEASE OBEY THE LAW. I WANTED ALL THE DISCIPLES TO KNOW THAT YOU SHOULD FOLLOW YOUR GOVERNMENT’S ADVICE.

I HEARD THAT IN USA, CANADA AND A FEW MORE COUNTRIES THAT GOVERNMENTS HAVE ANNOUNCED NO LARGE GATHERINGS. PLEASE FOLLOW YOUR COUNTRY’S ADVICE, RECOMMENDATION AND ANNOUNCEMENT AS PRECAUTIONARY STEPS. NO NEED TO PANIC BUT HAVE ALL THE PRECAUTIONARY STEPS TAKEN.

I RECOMMEND ALL DISCIPLES AND DEVOTEES NOT TO DO ANY INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL. I WANT ALL OF DEVOTEES TO TAKE THE PACHAIPATINNI VIRATHAM FOR MAHAMARIAMMAN AND MARATHON OF MAHAVAKYA CHANTING. AND REQUEST MAHAMARIAMMAN TO HEAL THE WHOLE WORLD. I WILL GET THE PRECISE PROCEDURES DONE IN SAMAYAPURAM AND SHARE WITH ALL OF YOU. IT IS OUR SPIRITUAL RESPONSIBILITY TO HEAL ANY PROBLEM HUMANITY FACES.

LET’S INSTALL MARIAMMAN IN ALL OUR TEMPLES AND HOMES. I STRONGLY RECOMMEND ALL DEVOTEES, DISCIPLES, SANYASIS, KAILAYAVASIS TO AVOID ANY INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL. I THINK IT IS REALLY BECOMING SERIOUS. NOT ONLY I RECOMMEND YOU TO OBEY YOUR COUNTRY’S RULES AND RECOMMENDATIONS, PLEASE AVOID ALL INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL.

IF WE OBSERVE PACHAIPATINNI VIRATHAM, CORONA IS IRRELEVANT FOR US. IN SOUTH INDIA, EVERY VILLAGE WOULD HAVE A MARIAMMAN TEMPLE. IN WEST BENGAL AND KERALA , SHE IS KNOWN AS SITALA. IN TAMIL NADU, SHE IS CALLED MARIAMMAN, IN KARNATAKA,SHE IS KNOWN AS MARIKAMBA. UP NORTH, SHE IS CALLED SITALA MATA. SHE HAS MULTIPLE NAMES - ISAKKI MARIAMMAN , DANDU MARIAMMAN. SHE IS MY KULADEVATA ALSO. LET’S PRAY TO HER AND DO PACHAIPATINNI VIRATHAM. NOT ONLY WE ARE PROTECTED, THE WHOLE WORLD IS PROTECTED AND HEALED FROM THIS CORONAVIRUS PROBLEM.

IF YOU SEE WHAT MODERN DAY IS DESCRIBING AS RECOMMENDATION FOR THE CORONAVIRUS, YOU WILL SEE IT IS EXACTLY ALSO DESCRIBED IN PACHAIPATINNI VIRATHAM. SO, WHATEVER OUR RISHIS PRESCRIBE, IT IS HIGHLY SCIENTIFIC. LET’S DO PACHAIPATINNI VIRATHAM AND MAHAVAKYA CHANTING. SHE WILL SHOWER HER GRACE AND PROTECT ALL OF US.
